name: LaVey
description:
LaVey is a first-person psychological horror game that tells the story of an alternate hell. The protagonist is a young man whose life was cut short after a visit to her. Your goal is to understand and return to normal life. Developer: https://steamcommunity.com/id/fiziksss/ Developer: https://steamcommunity.com/id/brandt_the_sinner

Developer: https://www.instagram.com/brandioofc/

Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/lgzteam.official/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100086183182638

Twitter: https://twitter.com/LGZteam
